article_title: Middle Class Jobs Are Disappearing And The Fed Is The Culprit

article_metadata.description: The Fed’s low interest rates are encouraging greater reliance on capital. So why are people surprised that job growth has been weak?
article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman
